posts.title: Book Notes - Chinese
posts.excerpt: 这里保存一些目前只找到中文版的图书的读书笔记. This is a place I store book notes and related information. The books and the notes here are the Edition in Chinese.

posts.title: Python Learning
posts.excerpt: The introduciton of Python and some notes when learning
posts.text: The introduciton of Python and some notes when learning Notes for 《Learn Python The Hard Way》: Use PEMDAS(Parentheses Exponents Multiplication Division Addition Subtraction) to help remeber the calculating priority. Could use “%r” to debug because it will show the raw data of the parameter. Command Line programming is very important for beginners. Reference: 《Learn Python The Hard Way》 This book is suitable for person who did not know much about Computer Programming and Python before. This book indicate some good habits programer should posses, which I believe is very good for beginners. Reading time apporximately is

posts.title: Start this Blog
posts.text: Welcome to Mysite! Blog’s StructureTags Records, Notes, Python Categories Documents, Programming Language Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Hexo TipsCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment References: Building: How to build this blog and some small improvements How to deploy Articles How to optimize Visualization Performance of Next Adjusting: How to activate “tags” and “categories” functionsStep 1Step 2 How to store the images in github repository Use plug-in unit of relative routine / Embedding an image using markdown Plug-in unit format: put the image in “source/_post” 1$ {% asset_img ["/" + imageFileName + "." + imageFormat] [imamge descirption]] %} Modifying/Updating: Use hexo-hey to manage Blog hexo-hey github source code page
